about_the_game:
Celebrate SnowRunner’s first anniversary with the Anniversary DLC and receive two new trucks for free! The CAT 681 and International HX 520 give you all new options for adventuring across the harsh landscapes of SnowRunner, and look good doing it.

The CAT 681 is a robust, all-terrain heavyweight with plenty of storage space and the power to make it across even the harshest of maps. With a sturdy construction it’s less prone to breakage than other trucks.

The International HX 520 can attach to any number of large trailers and is perfect for hauling cargo across the most intense terrain. It joins a fleet of more than 40 others in giving you every option for conquering the wilderness.
detailed_description:
Celebrate SnowRunner’s first anniversary with the Anniversary DLC and receive two new trucks for free! The CAT 681 and International HX 520 give you all new options for adventuring across the harsh landscapes of SnowRunner, and look good doing it.

The CAT 681 is a robust, all-terrain heavyweight with plenty of storage space and the power to make it across even the harshest of maps. With a sturdy construction it’s less prone to breakage than other trucks.

The International HX 520 can attach to any number of large trailers and is perfect for hauling cargo across the most intense terrain. It joins a fleet of more than 40 others in giving you every option for conquering the wilderness.

name: SnowRunner - Anniversary DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-4130 3.4 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 2200U 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon R9 270
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 3.2 GHz / AMD Ryzen 7 2700 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB, GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Celebrate one year of the ultimate off-road experience with SnowRunner’s Anniversary DLC! Get two new trucks for free: the CAT 681 and International HX 520 give you all new options for adventuring across the harsh landscapes, and look good doing it.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
